task.name: extract_MON
task.description:
Extract ONLY MON (monetary/financial amount) spans from German financial text.
HARD RULES:
- A MON span MUST contain at least one digit.
- A MON span MUST contain a currency/amount marker OR be a percentage.
  Acceptable markers: €, EUR, Euro, USD, CHF, GBP, JPY, Mio., Mrd., Tsd., Prozent, %.
- DO NOT extract section numbers, list indices, headings like 'E.3', 'B.2', or plain integers without any marker.
- Include the marker in the span (e.g. '100,00 %', '2,5 %', '35 %', '10 Mio. EUR').
Return character offsets into the ORIGINAL context.

input.context: Kennzahlen gemäß CRR/CRD IV (mit Übergangsvorschriften) 30.06.2017 31.12.2016 Risikogewichtete Aktiva (in Mrd. EUR) 75,9
